name: notesapp
description: NotesApp - Your Personal Note Taking Solution

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.render-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Ankush Gemnani
